00040 class SimpleWeightUpdate

00042  public:
00055   void UpdateWeights(const arma::mat& trainData,
00056                      arma::mat& weightVectors,
00057                      const size_t labelIndex,
00058                      const size_t vectorIndex,
00059                      const size_t rowIndex,
00060                      const arma::rowvec& D)
00061   {
00062     weightVectors.row(rowIndex) = weightVectors.row(rowIndex) - 
00063                                   D(labelIndex) * trainData.col(labelIndex).t();
00064 
00065     weightVectors.row(vectorIndex) = weightVectors.row(vectorIndex) +
00066                                      D(labelIndex) * trainData.col(labelIndex).t();
00067   }
00068 };
